General.Name: Korea Asset Investment Securities Co. Ltd
General.Description: Korea Asset Investment Securities Co., Ltd. engages in corporate finance for small and medium sized enterprises, OTC stock trading, alternative investment and crowd funding. The company offers investment banking services, including corporate finance, structured finance, real estate finance, and green energy finance; institutional sales finance for institutional client business, bonds, and financial services; and retail finance, such as personal financing services. It also provides wholesale and brokerage services. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Shinsong Center Building, Seoul, South Korea, 07327
